    Pokedex Simulator -Samples random pokemon

    pokedex.sim.Rd

    Pokedex Simulator -Samples random pokemon

    Usage

    pokedex.sim(n, replace = T, gen = 1, prob)

    Arguments

    n

    number of pokemon to return

    replace

    controls whether to sample with replacement or not

    gen

    controls which generation of pokemon to sample from, default is 1st gen

    prob

    an optional parameter that controls probability of sampling see sample()

    Value

    a dataframe of random selected pokemon

    Examples

    pokedex.sim(10)
#>       X pokedex_number             name generation status type_number  type_1
#> 81   80             62        Poliwrath          1 Normal           2   Water
